description: This promptware is used to create product names from examples words.
creator: OpenAI

product_name_generator.name: product_name_generator
product_name_generator.description: This promptware is used to create product names from examples words.
demonstration:
Product description: A home milkshake maker
Seed words: fast, healthy, compact.
Product names: HomeShaker, Fit Shaker, QuickShake, Shake Maker

input.text:
Product description: A pair of shoes that can fit any foot size.
Seed words: adaptable, fit, omni-fit.

example.output: Product names: AdaptFits, OmniShoes, FitAlls, FootFits.

example_prompt:
